Gaijin virgin Slayer pad

Sakura River View is a very nice private apartment that faces directly on the banks of the River Takase. Recently renovated, this studio apartment of 35sqm has two tatami bedrooms separated by sliding wooden doors.

It comes with a bathtub & shower, a separate toilet and also a complete kitchenette to complement your stay.
